programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever Ep6
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Madagascar Ep1
programme.desc: Madagascar is home to strange animals not found anywhere else on Earth. When these animals fight for supremacy, their battles are just as strange - from weird neck-wrestling weevils to ring-tailed lemur moms that go into battle with baby on board.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Australia Ep2
programme.desc: Australia is home to an eclectic array of creatures, and the ways to succeed as an alpha are just as diverse. The beach turns into a dueling ground, and the outback becomes a boxing ring, as animals face off with their own kind.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: Get a front-row seat to the planet’s biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africa’s east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.

programme.title: A Bee's Diary
programme.desc: In a beehive, tens of thousands of tiny animals work toward a common goal: the survival of the colony. But what is life like for an individual honeybee? A Bee’s Diary tells that story.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Invasion Begins Ep1
programme.desc: When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Strength in Sisterhood Ep2
programme.desc: The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomad’s brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Punks on the Run Ep3
programme.desc: The lions of the Nomad pride rampage deep into the heart of the MK pride’s territory, scattering its members and coming dangerously close to the five new MK cubs. Meanwhile, the Hollywoods are recovering, and Ava’s survival skills are still intact.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Punks Strike Back Ep4
programme.desc: After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Hollywoods Held Hostage Ep5
programme.desc: During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty Ep6
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Savanna Ep3
programme.desc: The African savanna is an epic landscape, and whether it’s head-bashing hippos, hormone-crazed elephants or dueling lions, battles that rage on the savanna are just as epic.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - India Ep4
programme.desc: Welcome to India – a land of exotic animals and exotic warfare. Monkeys stage dusty dust-ups, blackbucks wage open war on the open plains, and peacock dandies swing switchblades: these are colorful battles worthy of a vibrant land.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Spring Ep1
programme.desc: In Southern Africa, Spring starts in early September and the natural world stirs into life. Days begin to lengthen, temperatures rise, and animals and plants combine in an orchestrated effort to reproduce, give birth and raise their young.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Summer Ep2
programme.desc: Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Autumn Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn in Africa brings opportunities. Cape Fur seals, Samango monkeys, chameleons, impala, and more respond to the season. Autumn triggers changes in the lives of many animals. Rare creatures reveal themselves and predators gather to take advantage.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Winter Ep4
programme.desc: Be an eyewitness to the death and resurrection that winter brings to Africa. Observe what comes with shorter days, from drought conditions to frigid winds, and marvel at the survival skills of animals and plants as they face the season’s fury.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family Ep1
programme.desc: Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Center, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Battle to Save a Sea Lion Ep2
programme.desc: Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - One Very Lost Sea Turtle Ep3
programme.desc: Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: A veteran pair of osprey return home to a Connecticut saltmarsh. Over one summer they must battle their enemies, withstand the elements, and hunt hundreds and hundreds of fish, all to raise the next generation of sea raptors.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - Arid Heart Ep1
programme.desc: From the vast, dry plains of the interior come some of Australia’s most recognized imagery, such as the monolithic red rock of Uluru and the bounding red kangaroo. But how did the arid center of the continent come to be?

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - The Great Divide Ep2
programme.desc: Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Savanna Ep3

programme.desc: Lawn Mowing Bot - Host Mo Rocca shows us: The device to quickly teach you how to play the guitar. Robotic lawn mower cuts your grass. Replace tissue with a cloth handkerchief dispenser. And, the genius of Nicola Tesla.

programme.title: Cyborgs: Human Machines
programme.desc: Some people are fusing their bodies with technology to increase their abilities and expand their senses – real life cyborgs. Who are these people? What drives them? Where is the ethical boundary?

programme.title: VR101 Ep7
programme.desc: Medicine - VR is used on various medical aspects. But healthcare procedures involve sensations which are conveyed from skin contact to our brain. As VR cannot yet replicate the senses, how is it useful?

programme.title: VR101 Ep8
programme.desc: Future Of VR - Can you imagine we are influenced by VR in the future from food to transportation? Even our social would become virtual. Which direction of VR technology is developing towards?

programme.title: ShiGGa Shay's 365 Mixed Reality Experience
programme.desc: In ShiGGa Shay’s 365 Mixed Reality Experience, first of its kind in Southeast Asia, the rapper performs as a digital avatar. The audience is transported to fantastical 360° environments.

programme.title: The Gadget Show (S33) Ep6
programme.desc: Ortis and Jon battle it out to see if now's the time to upgrade to an 8K TV, or if more affordable 4K sets offer all the picture quality you need.

programme.title: The Gadget Show (S33) Ep7
programme.desc: TV duo Dick and Dom embark on a day-trip which leads them to find out which is the best 42-inch TV on the market. Ortis and Georgie get mucky on the farm to test washing machines.

programme.title: The Gadget Show (S33) Ep10
programme.desc: Can a free camera app protect homes effectively? Budget smart speakers and gaming monitors are also tested out.

programme.title: The Gadget Show (S33) Ep12
programme.desc: Jon and Georgie check out new BBQs, asking whether you should buy gas or charcoal? Craig heeds the call of the outdoors, by installing a smart weather monitor.

programme.title: Donal's Family Food in Minutes (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: In this episode Donal shows us how to make a roast veg curry, sticky toffee pudding, Yuk Sun, and a classic roast chicken.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo: My Swedish Kitchen (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: A Festive Ending - Rachel prepares cold crayfish and serves it with warm crayfish soup and a cheese pie. For dessert, she makes a classic Swedish cheese cake, served warm with whipped cream and jam.

programme.title: Gino's Italian Family Adventure (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Family in Sardinia - Gino and his family explore the hidden gems of Eastern Sardinia, lunching on a secluded beach before heading into the mountains.

programme.title: Gino's Italian Family Adventure (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Rocco in Naples - Gino and son Rocco head to bustling Naples - they discover incredible street food and Gino cooks up one of his mamma's favourite recipes.

programme.title: Gino's Italian Family Adventure (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Luciano in Calabria - Gino and son Luciano travel to rustic Calabria to experience the Italian simple life on a traditional swordfishing boat and on a farm.

programme.title: Gino's Italian Family Adventure (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Mia in Northern Sardinia - Gino and daughter Mia head to Gallura in northern Sardinia to discover local traditions and recipes handed down through the generations.

programme.desc: 1980s Week - The bakers tackle a quiche, a retro technical and an ice cream showstopper.

programme.title: Bake Off - The Professionals (S4) Ep3
programme.desc: Chocolate Week and Mechanical Showpieces - It's chocolate week and the teams must master perfection in a surprise challenge, before constructing mechanical showpieces, complete with chocolate bons bons and a moving part.

programme.title: The Great Pottery Throw Down (S4) Ep4
programme.desc: It's naked raku week and the remaining potters throw, burnish and fire a pair of vases, and are set a floral challenge by guest judge and flower-making expert Rita Floyd

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off (S11) Ep7
programme.desc: 1980s Week - The bakers tackle a quiche, a retro technical and an ice cream showstopper.

programme.title: Donal's Family Food in Minutes (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: Donal shares a series of recipes that have been passed down through his family, including a winter pavlova, kleftico, lemon slices and coq au vin blanc.

programme.title: Donal's Family Food in Minutes (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: Donal shares recipes that would be perfect for a dinner for two, including a cod and tomato bake and butterscotch puddings.

programme.title: Donal's Super Food in Minutes (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: Donal brings his culinary tips and tricks to the holiday season. Recipes include spiced duck with figs, a winter-warming chilli, coconut, sweet potato and red lentil soup and a citrus polenta cake.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off (S11) Ep8
programme.desc: Dessert Week - The signature round features a miniature cheesecake, while the technical challenge features a dish that dates back to the 17th century. Finally, for their showstoppers, the bakers must concoct a jelly art dessert cake constructed of delicate sponge.

programme.title: Bake Off - The Professionals (S4) Ep4
programme.desc: Miniature Classics and the Humble Fruit Crumble - Six new teams tackle two miniature classics - lemon meringue pie and tiramisu - and transform the humble fruit crumble into breathtaking towering edible showpiece sculptures.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (S4) Ep4
programme.desc: Nimb Hotel, Copenhagen - Monica and Giles travel to a hotel in Copenhagen that aims to deliver complete happiness. They visit Nimb Hotel in the historic Tivoli Gardens, where Monica dives to clean a vast tropical aquarium.

programme.desc: Donal brings his culinary tips and tricks to the holiday season. Recipes include spiced duck with figs, a winter-warming chilli, coconut, sweet potato and red lentil soup and a citrus polenta cake.

programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: We've got big hits and they're even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Lake Ball Pit / The Poppy Corn Festival - Cannonball! Archibald becomes a lifeguard at Lake Ball Pit. When Loy can't get along with a rival, Archibald gets a lesson in the art of sarcasm.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep18
programme.desc: What Screams May Come/Grunt Anything - Eep joins the Scream-Leading team and starts picking up characteristics of her coach, Meep, much to Ugga's chagrin/Meep kicks Snoot out of the cave for not being a brave hunter. The Croods reluctantly take Snoot in and try to make him into a hunter to get him out of their home.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Lucky And The Field Trip Fraud - Lucky is determined to shed her reputation as “teacher’s pet” on the class field trip.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever Ep17
programme.desc: Treasure Of Sierra Harvey / Babies Day In - Tiny finds a map to a legendary hoard of buried toys. Lotta takes in three abandoned baby raccoons and treats them as pets.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep17
programme.desc: The Terror Of Tickula / Prank’D - Turbo and Whiplash meet a strange tick who may be out to harm Turbo.//When the crew starts a prank war, Chet is nervous that he is the next target.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Mecha-Menace - Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Lake Ball Pit / The Poppy Corn Festival - Cannonball! Archibald becomes a lifeguard at Lake Ball Pit. When Loy can't get along with a rival, Archibald gets a lesson in the art of sarcasm.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep17
programme.desc: Big Brain Boov / Pook Pooks - When Tip can't solve a homework problem, Oh takes them to the Big Brain Boov; Oh feels he can't "Pook Pook" in front of Tip, creating a gross mix-up.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep17
programme.desc: Election - After he’s rescued from a cave, a charismatic old lemur challenges Julien to an election for the throne.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep17
programme.desc: Chilling Out In Antarctica - The Wanderers travel to Antarctica to witness the annual march of the penguins. Odlulu and Fritz show up looking to build an awesome fort using the Ice Castle Key. Odlulu's new ice fort separates a waddle of penguins from their eggs. The Wanderers must find a way through the ice fort to reunite the parents with their chicks.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep17
programme.desc: Trolly Tales 2 / Rainbowmageddon - The Trolls try to entertain and win over Archer Pastry with a series of Troll stories/When a rainbow over Troll Village begins to experience a catastrophic breakdown, Cloud Guy arrives in the village to offer his assistance

programme.title: The Mighty Ones S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Colossal Strawberry/The Sappening - When Berry sees a "giant strawberry," she's convinced that the prophecy of the berry colossus has com e true and that she's been chosen to lead her people to their true calling. Rocksy, meanwhile, is devastated that her friend is leaving, unti she realizes the strawberry is actually a pinata and Berry is in danger! / Twig is afraid his sapping will put the Mighty Ones in peril, but Rocksy aims to show him that his sap can be used for good.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Hush, Little Baby - When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Preposterous Pulverizing Of The Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep17
programme.desc: Moles - Jack Sprat and Puss journey underground in search of treasure and discovery a kingdom of moles led by a rather bizarre king.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep17
programme.desc: Almost Famoose: Chapter Four - Rocky and Bullwinkle return to Frostbite Falls to discover that because they failed to rebuild the giant birdbath, their beloved town is now completely overrun with dirty, zombie-like birds.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep17
programme.desc: Bad Moon Rising - After a strange creature bites Tuffnut, he believes he'll turn into a legendary Lycanwing dragon when the moon is full unless his friends can save him

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep17
programme.desc: Greening The Cube - Team Volron follows a distress signal to a planet that is half-mech, half-forest to rescue a king who has been kidnapped by the Galra

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep17
programme.desc: Big Brain Boov / Pook Pooks - When Tip can't solve a homework problem, Oh takes them to the Big Brain Boov; Oh feels he can't "Pook Pook" in front of Tip, creating a gross mix-up.

Odlulu and Fritz show up looking to build an awesome fort using the Ice Castle Key. Odlulu's new ice fort separates a waddle of penguins from their eggs. The Wanderers must find a way through the ice fort to reunite the parents with their chicks.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep37
programme.desc: The Case Of The Pocket'S Present - Fuse asks Noddy to take a present to the Pockets. But when Noddy arrives at the Treehouse, he discovers he's carrying an empty box. The present, whatever it was, has gone! Noddy must investigate: where is the Pockets' present? But how will he ever find it when he doesn't actually know what it is? It's going to take all his detecting skills to solve this one!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep38
programme.desc: The Case Of Fuse'S New Game - When Fuse invites his friends to come for a playdate all they want to do is play his new computer game. But then suddenly the computer goes off. He soon discovers there's a power cut affecting the whole of Brickabuild. But who switched off the power? And why? Desperate to carry on with the game, Noddy decides to investigate: how can they play Fuse's new game?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep39
programme.desc: The Case Of The Pirate'S Treasure (Ex : The Case Of The Queen'S Dance) - Queen Sparklewings asks the Pirate Captain to do the first dance with her at the Queen's Dance. But when it's time to practise, the Captain can't come: someone's stolen their treasure! Noddy decides to help find the treasure so the Captain will still be able to dance. He needs to investigate: Who stole the Pirates' treasure?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep40
programme.desc: The Case Of The Empty Store - Clockwork Mouse leaves Carlton in charge of getting everything ready for the Builders' Parade. Carlton gratefully accepts Noddy's offer of help but doesn't want the Naughticorns helping too! But when Carlton goes to the Brickabuild Store for supplies, he's horrified to discover the store is empty. How will they get the parade ready now? And will Clockwork Mouse ever trust Carlton again? Noddy sets out to investigate: Who took all the stuff from the Brickabuild Store?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep11
programme.desc: Scritch Scratch - Raa Raa always scratches his claws in the morning, but his scratching post has fallen apart. He sets off to find himself a new one in the jungliest bit. When he does eventually find a new scratching post it is huge, how is he going to get it home again?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep12
programme.desc: Hurry Up Raa Raa - Raa Raa has agreed to do too many things with too many people today. Will he be able to do them and keep all his friends happy? More importantly, will it make him happy?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep13
programme.desc: Rumble In The Jungle - Zebby is upset when Raa Raa laughs at her rumbling tummy and runs off to hide. Raa Raa sets out to find his friend and apologise… he thinks it will be easy, he just has to listen out for the sound of her tummy, but who knew how many other rumbling noises there were?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep14
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Favourite Noise - Raa Raa is inspired by his friends to search for his favourite noise in the jingly jangly jungle. The little lion cub and his friends set out to find out what Raa Raa's Favourite Noise could be…

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep37
programme.desc: High-Tech Overload - Big Chris has got a new gadget to monitor the cars. He puts it to the test, what could possibly go wrong?!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep38
programme.desc: Workshop Chaos - Big Chris is furious when Marsha tidies up his workshop - how's he supposed to work in these conditions? Luckily Flash saves helps out by messing it up again!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep39
programme.desc: Silver Hatch Shapes Up - Conrod is having an engine tune up at Silver Hatch. He boasts that his spoilers make him faster than all the other cars… who then want to be just as fast as their V8 hero…

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep40
programme.desc: Pit Stop Perils - Mr Carburettor is fed up with Roary and Maxi constantly bickering about who is the fastest car at Silver Hatch. He decrees that the pair will have a race, and whoever wins, is the fastest - no more arguing!

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep19
programme.desc: Ring My Bell / First Mate Casper - Ring My Bell When Casper encourages Quasi to go on strike from his thankless job as chore boy, Alder and Dash make Casper take his place. First Mate Casper When Cappy needs a first mate, Casper's the only one who's up to the challenge.

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep20
programme.desc: Power Outage Part 1 + 2 - Power Outage – Part 1: A Powerful Foe When Scare School falls victim to the Baccora, Kibosh encourages the students to work together, setting booby-traps and building defences. Power Outage – Part 2: Razznik's Revenge Creature by creature, the evil entity, Baccora, robs Scare School of its powers and locks them into a magical cleptor.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep18
programme.desc: Over Shadowed / Beware The Chickipede - White Shadow quits racing and it's up to Turbo to convince him to get back on the track.//The crew becomes detectives and meets a strange new creature.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep18
programme.desc: The Paperbirds / Rock And Egg Roll - A gang of crooks mistakes Archibald for a criminal mastermind. Archibald unearths a rock with mysterious — and feather-raising — powers.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Night Of The Frodarg - On a dark and stormy night, Tim's fears of a local legend and Boss Baby's fear of a PuppyCo agent force the brothers to unite to stay safe as the house is infiltrated

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Dastardlys Deed Of The Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep18
programme.desc: Snoutlout Gets The Axe - When Snotlout and Astrid must fly a ceremonial battle axe to a family wedding, they must work together when an Armorwing dragon derails their plan

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep18
programme.desc: Mermaid - To prove he's a ladies' man, Puss rescues a mermaid, who instantly falls in love with him … and becomes his worst nightmare

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep18
programme.desc: Daddy Julien - King Julien believes Mort is the son he never knew he had – despite the fact that Mort is two years older than him.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep18
programme.desc: Coop, Where'S My Guy? / Fluffleberry Quest - When Cooper loses Guy Diamond in Troll Forest, Poppy and Branch accompany him as he retraces his steps /Poppy sets out to recreate the recipe of Branch's favorite dessert at any cost

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep18
programme.desc: Gluphosaurus - When D-Structs tricks the Gluphosaurs into attacking the Dinotrux, Revvit must befriend them and find a way to “unstick” the crew from one another.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Summer Holiday - In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Spring Lamb - Julian's preparing for “spring has sprung”, the Greendale school play, when pat gets a special delivery call. It's a yeti costume for Bill. When Pat is diverted into the countryside by PC Selby, he spots one of Alf's missing sheep - and she's about to have a lamb! Alf can't get there as his quad bike is being fixed, so Pat offers to take the sheep in his van. But the sheep is reluctant to move. Meanwhile, Bill is worried that his costume won't turn up and he'll let his classmates down. Out in the fields, Pat hits upon the idea of dressing up like a woolly sheep by putting on the yeti costume. It works! But there's another surprise in store as he delivers the sheep to alf at the school - she's had her lamb! Bill, Pat and lamb all play starring roles in the play. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Painted Sheep - Pat has got to deliver special cans of blue dye for Alf to mark up his cheeky runaway sheep. That way, when they get out, he can work out which sheep belong to him! Meanwhile, the kids are having a special delivery service day of their own as Ben gives them a tour of the Sorting Office. It's not much fun as Ben won't let them touch anything – and when they do, they cause chaos! Meanwhile, Alf's sheep have runaway and Pat can't find either them or Alf! By using the tracking device on Alf's phone and deputising the kids to be act as “special delivery deputies”, Pat is eventually able to locate Alf and the runaway sheep! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Olivia Ep35
programme.desc: Olivia Runs A Carnival - When Mrs. Hogenmuller's class plans a Parents' Night, Olivia thrills her classmates when she suggests the idea of a carnival. In her own special way Olivia oversees the construction of games and amusements, and when the night of the carnival arrives, she still has a few surprises up her sleeve.

programme.title: Olivia Ep36
programme.desc: Olivia Makes Magic - After seeing Grandma perform an impromptu magic show, Olivia begins practicing her own magic tricks. She doesn't have much success, until she manages to make herself “disappear” for Ian and Julian. They can't figure out how she's done it, but Ian doesn't care. He just wants his big sister back!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep35
programme.desc: Silver Hatch Pizza - Mr Carburettor has demanded pizza for lunch but the pizzeria is closed. How is Marsha going to ensure Mr Carburettor gets the lunch he asked for?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep36
programme.desc: Silver Hatch Stars - Roary is feeling put out as all the cars are paying Conrod too much attention. He is determined to show his worth when they race that afternoon. But tries too hard and ends up in danger. Who can save him?

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep18
programme.desc: The Paperbirds / Rock And Egg Roll - A gang of crooks mistakes Archibald for a criminal mastermind. Archibald unearths a rock with mysterious — and feather-raising — powers.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep19
programme.desc: There Will Be Eggs/I Think We'Re Alone Meow - Eep & Thunk want to be in on the new fad of Slateboarding, but must find something to trade with (eggs). Bud and Crud try to corner the egg market/Gran takes in a group of crabby tabbies, and uses their combined crabbiness to get whatever she wants. Grug and Ugga try to get into Snoot's food-sharing party.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Lucky And The Shaky Day - When an earthquake takes out the railroad bridge, the PALs must find a way to stop the oncoming train – which Jim is aboard

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever Ep18
programme.desc: The Lice Storm / Mission Impossibow - Audrey catches lice from an Avenue kid and thinks all Avenue kids are lice-filled. Dot gets even when The Bow doesn't pick her to be on a special team.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep18
programme.desc: Over Shadowed / Beware The Chickipede - White Shadow quits racing and it's up to Turbo to convince him to get back on the track.//The crew becomes detectives and meets a strange new creature.

programme.desc: Summer Holiday - In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.desc: The Paperbirds / Rock And Egg Roll - A gang of crooks mistakes Archibald for a criminal mastermind. Archibald unearths a rock with mysterious — and feather-raising — powers.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep18
programme.desc: Waltor / Out Foxed - When Tip is too busy to hang, Oh steals and befriends a squid from the city aquarium; The B. O. Boys attempt to tear Tip and Oh apart.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep18
programme.desc: Daddy Julien - King Julien believes Mort is the son he never knew he had – despite the fact that Mort is two years older than him.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep18
programme.desc: Mini Mayhem In Moscow - Whitebeard uses the Grow Key to make himself 40' tall. But the key breaks! So the Wanderers take the key to Wizard Fix-It in Moscow. While fixing the key, Fix-It accidentally makes Waldo, Wenda and herself two inches tall! So begins a Nutcracker-like mini-adventure in Moscow to retrieve the key from Odlulu and Fritz.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep18
programme.desc: Coop, Where'S My Guy? / Fluffleberry Quest - When Cooper loses Guy Diamond in Troll Forest, Poppy and Branch accompany him as he retraces his steps /Poppy sets out to recreate the recipe of Branch's favorite dessert at any cost

programme.title: The Mighty Ones S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Wad Of Friendship/Twig Puts Down Roots - Berry and Rocksy are thrilled about spending every waking moment together when they get stuck to the same piece of gum, but as more people join their gum ball, things spiral out of control. \ When Twig begins to root, he thinks his dreams of becoming a Mighty Oak Tree are finally coming true! But as the Mighty Ones observe his "roots" growing in a weird and gross manner, they try to convince Twig that maybe things aren't what they seem.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep41
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Players - It's time for the Toyland football match but the game can't go ahead until Noddy finds the missing players. Noddy discovers that someone misdirected Pat Pat and Deltoid so that they'd miss the match. Noddy finds the missing players and reunites everyone at the real football pitch but then Hoof disappears. Noddy discovers that Hoof misdirected the others because he wanted to be the best player. Hoof learns that football is a team sport where all the team members need to work together to make it the best game ever. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep42
programme.desc: The Case Of The Changed Basketball Hoop - Noddy's about to play a game of basketball with Big Ears and Deltoid when he realizes that the hoop has been fiddled with. Who could've done that and why? Noddy's investigation leads him to Fuse, who explains that he just wanted to help the toys that weren't as skilled as him. Everyone practises and realises that the best way to improve at sport is to keep practising. Well done Noddy.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep43
programme.desc: The Case Of The Ruined Crops - Farmer Tom is confused and upset when he finds all his trees and corn knocked over. Noddy decides to investigate: who spoiled Farmer Tom's crops? He soon discovers lots of strange heavy bags scattered all over the farm. Whose are they? Where did they come from? And what could they possibly have to do with Smartysaurus's new hot air balloon?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep44
programme.desc: The Case Of The Broken Pulley - The Head Builder isn't happy. Someone's been playing with the builders' stuff and now their pulley doesn't work. Noddy decides he needs to find out who did it before anything else goes wrong. Who broke the Builders' pulley?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep15
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo Slips Up - Raa Raa and the other animals keep slipping up on banana skins that are littering the jungle floor. Where could they have come from? Together the animals clear up the mess and discover who has been littering the jungle with banana skins.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep16
programme.desc: No Sleep Til Bedtime - It is nap time in the Jingly Jangly Jungle but Raa Raa is not tired and is determined to play hide and seek with his friends, whether they like it or not! But all this running about can be tiring work for a noisy little lion cub…

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Shark Strength - When a game of coral pins bowling gets out of fin, Baby must learn to control his shark strength.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep716
programme.desc: Pups Save the Chalk Art / Pups Save a Hot Potato - The Mini Patrol and the Pups race to the rescue to save a local mural before the rain comes. // Farmer Al and Yumi find out their garden is full of holes and their one of a kind potato is missing. Now the pups must find the potato thief!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Paddington Flies a Kite / Paddington the Detective - It's a windy day and Jonathan wishes to play kite with his dad. Since Mr. Brown is stuck at home, Paddington takes Jonathan to the park. // DAN Drainpipe Dan is stealing Mrs. Brown's wedding ring. Inspector Paddington of the yard is on his trail.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep325
programme.desc: Numbers - Peppa and her friends learn how to count by playing games at Madame Gazelle's daycare.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep326
programme.desc: Digging Up the Road - Peppa and her family are trying to get to the playground, but Mr Bull's roadworks are in the way.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Freddy Fox - Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it is Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep171
programme.desc: Bubu's New Blue Jeans - Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep172
programme.desc: Everywhere at Once - Anna has prepared her ice cream for everyone but forgets to place it in the freezer. - as she is trying to help all her friends at once, the ice cream melts! Is it ruined or can it be saved?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Blue's Big Beat Band - Josh and Blue are starting a band! As we play Blue's Clues to find out what instrument Blue will play, we form our very own house band, learn rhythms, identify tempos, and sing, tap, and clap all day long.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep821
programme.desc: Dancing with Luke Stars! / Pups Save a Mischievous Octopus - A dance contest being judged by Luke Stars goes wrong when a floating dancefloor carries the contestants away. // The pups investigate a mystery at an undersea-themed museum exhibit and discover an octopus that wants to return to the ocean

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep718
programme.desc: Pups Save Little Hairy - Big Hairy's little brother falls into a hole and Tracker gets carried away by Big Hairy. It's time for a Jungle Rescue!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza / The Present - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town. // Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Were wig on the the loose / Lights Camera Action - When Sir Steel's high-tech wig malfunctions and goes on the rampage in Platinum City the Deer Squad race to the rescue. // The Deer Squad must think fast to save Lady Fluffpot when Sir Steel's filming turns into a Disaster Movie!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt - Mr. Brown is worried he won't get sleep since the kids will be scared camping in the treehouse. Paddington wants to prove him wrong but there is a lightning storm. // There's a monster in Paddington's room and Mrs. Bird takes him on a monster hunt.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Paddington And The Banana - Paddington accidentally takes a banana from the café without paying for it. He must return it before Sophia notices.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Dino Derby - Today, dinosaur Blaze is teaming up with his prehistoric pal Zeg to compete in... the Dino Derby! But will this dino duo have what it takes to outrace the rest and become Dino Derby champions?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Sir Blaze and the Unicorn - Witness the return of Sir Blaze and Sir AJ as they embark on an epic quest to free a magical unicorn from an unpoppable bubble!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Whale of a Tale / The Pirate Painter - When whales start to pile up in Caracole Cove, Santi and crew must stop the noisy undersea disruption to their usual migration pattern. // When Escarlata puts a spell on the brushes of a visiting Pirate Painter, Santi and crew must save the town.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Puppy Girl and Super Pup! - When supervillain Felina Meow starts turning all the dogs at the annual Dog Show into cats, it's up to superheroes Puppy Girl and Super Pup to stop her! Will they foil her cat-astrophic plan before she turns everyone's pups into kitties?!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep614
programme.desc: Search for the Great Gorilla! - When Primatologists Zooli and Gil searching the rainforest for a Silverback Gorilla, they're chased into an ancient temple by a robotic silverback... who turns out to just be a tiny marmoset guarding a sanctuary of mountain gorillas!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep525
programme.desc: Mr Potato's Christmas Show - Hoor-oink! It's Christmas, and Peppa's daycare is going to the theater to see a special play about the holiday. Some people have never been to a theater before.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle's Leaving Party - The children are sad because their favorite teacher, Madame Gazelle, is leaving daycare. But a leaving party will give her a good send-off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep321
programme.desc: Trip to the Moon - Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep322
programme.desc: Grandpa at the Playground - Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and George to the playground, but does not understand the children's rules.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep177
programme.desc: The Funny Photo - While flipping through her Funny Photo Album, Froga is surprised to learn she has no funny picture of Anna! Setting off to remedy this, Froga instills the assistance of her friends to try to score a hilarious photo of Anna.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep178
programme.desc: The Gift Box - The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. When he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift, Christopher is convinced Bubu doesn't like his present.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Tenderest Bond of All - While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé

programme.desc: SpongeBob 129 / Karate Choppers - Fleeing from SpongeBob and Patrick's consistent noise, Squidward winds up frozen. // SpongeBob and Sandy's incessant Karate sparring is starting to wreak havoc in the Krusty Krab.

programme.desc: Midnight Snack Attack / Hot Pearl-tato - After SpongeBob and Patrick eat a secret snack experiment, Plankton must reverse the monstrous side effects. // Mr. Krabs needs to find a babysitter for little Pearl, but she proves too much for the campers to handle.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep211

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep712

programme.desc: The Flying Throne/Go Mumfie/The Three Promises/Beloved Pirates/The Photo For Yoyo/The Present/The Pink Mouse/The Restaurant - Black Cat has made a new, inflatable throne for his friend Kaleb. When Mumfie inflates it, he blows so hard that the throne flies away – right over Flutterstone.

programme.title: Dino Ranch Ep147/Ep139/Ep129/Ep119/Ep109
programme.desc: Storm-A-Lert/Trading Day/Treasure Ranch/Sneaky Swipers/Small Wonder - In the middle of an approaching storm, Miguel rushes through his important jobs so he can work on his new invention.

programme.title: Lucas The Spider Ep173/Ep163/Ep151/Ep142/Ep135/Ep125/Ep115/Ep103
programme.desc: Findley The Brave/The Mighty Boop And Fly Wonder/The Legend Of Big Butt/SleEp.ing Dogs/The Insult/Egg-Scuse Me/Bye Bye Bee/Big Jumping Spider - When Lucas is locked in a cuckoo clock, Findley must be brave enough to help!

programme.title: Bunnicula Ep9/Ep10/Ep49/Ep50
programme.desc: Son of Bunnicula/Evil Cat Videos/Mark of the Mandrake/Down the Rabbit Hole - After Chester assumes that an eggplant will cause Bunnicula to lay a monster egg, the rabbit decides to pull a prank on Chester and dresses up as his own baby.

programme.title: Bunnicula Ep29/Ep30/Ep69/Ep70
programme.desc: Puzzle Madness/Return of the Curse of the Weredude/Bunnicula in Space/Orlockdown - After being trapped in Bunnicula's evil puzzle box, Chester and Harold must solve three puzzles before they can escape.

programme.title: Roger Ep101/Ep102/Ep167/Ep168/Ep113/Ep106/Ep107/Ep108
programme.desc: Roger 3000/The Cake/Only In Your Dreams/Promises, Promises/Clean Up Time/Be Brave/The Terror/It's Green - Fatou absolutely has to play with Roger who is really busy. So to get some peace and quiet the alien constructs a clone playmate-robot he calls: Roger 3000. Things quickly get out of hand though because now that he considers himself to be Fatou’s super-best friend, Roger 3000 has no intentions of sharing her with anyone…especially not the real Roger!

programme.desc: Why Are Carbs Always Discarded? - Carbohydrates like bread, rice and noodles are the most widely discarded in Singapore. Why is this so and how can you transform stale carbs into brand new dishes?

programme.desc: Hong Kong's Environmental Solutions - The devastation from super typhoon Mangkhut in 2018 was an environmental wake-up call for Hong Kong, prompting a search for innovative solutions and lifestyle changes to tackle climate change.

programme.title: Asia Now
programme.desc: Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: Zero Waste Kitchen Ep2
programme.desc: When Does Food Really Expire? - A typical household in Singapore throws away an average of 19.6kg of expired food annually. But does all of it have to be thrown away? Host Isaac Henry investigates when food really expires.

programme.title: Asia Now
programme.desc: Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: Zero Waste Kitchen Ep3
programme.desc: Do You Waste Half The Fish? - We consume 16kg of fish per person yearly. But host Issac discovers that in one local fish farm, offcuts amount to 30,000 tonnes a year. What mouth-watering recipes using these offcuts can be created?

programme.title: Going Places With Ernie Dingo Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Ernie and special guest Aaron Fa'aoso explore the outback town of Longreach where they visit an ancient rock art site, a historic cattle station and learn about the founding of QANTAS.

programme.title: Strait To The Plate Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The people of Moa Island have always been farmers and gardeners and Aaron meets up with an old friend to learn how these traditions are being continued today.

programme.title: ABC News Summer Ep17
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch throughout the day with ABC News. We've got more reporters in more places, to tell you what's happening and why it matters. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep17
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you comprehensive coverage from our reporters on the ground telling you what's happening and why it matters. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: The Drum Ep2
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's lives everyday, encouraging debate on the topics important to us all with a panel that reflects the diversity of Australia.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep17
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Karina Carvalho.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep10
programme.desc: Australia's premier daily current affairs show is back in 2023, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Presented by Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep17
programme.desc: More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. Our network of reporters uncover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Karina Carvalho.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep28
programme.desc: Craig Foster built a formidable reputation as a football player and broadcaster. But when Bahraini footballer and refugee Hakeem Al-Araibi, was imprisoned in Thailand, he led a global media campaign to fight for his freedom.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep17
programme.desc: Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and the best coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Girish Sawlani.

programme.title: Kurt Fearnley's One Plus One Ep13
programme.desc: Judith Lucy is one of our most loved stand-up comedians. There are few subjects that are off the table. Judith discusses how she feels about a nation knowing about, and laughing at, her most private stories.

programme.title: The World Ep17
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - In 2016, a fire destroyed the much-loved old family homestead on Alistair and Belinda's dairy farm, in Inverloch, Victoria. The couple were determined to create something new that reflected the family's farming history.
